queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_s3_bucket with secureTransport != true as bucket
return bucket.tag.AccountName as name, count(bucket) as value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_s3_bucket 
  with classification != 'public' and
    ignorePublicAcls != true and 
    restrictPublicBuckets != true
  as bucket
that ALLOWS as grant everyone 
return 
  bucket.displayName, bucket.tag.AccountName, bucket.classification,
  grant.permission, grant.granteeType, grant.granteeURI

widgets.title: S3 buckets granted full access to someone other than the owner account

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_s3_bucket with _source!='system-mapper' as bucket 
  that ALLOWS as grant * as grantee
  (that ASSIGNED * as principal)?
where 
  bucket.accountId != grantee.accountId or
  (principal._type!=undefined and bucket.accountId != principal.accountId)
return tree

widgets.title: Unencrypted S3 buckets containing CloudTrail logs

queries.name: query1
queries.query: find aws_s3_bucket with encrypted!=true that (logs|allows) aws_cloudtrail

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find unique aws_s3_bucket that (logs|allows) aws_cloudtrail 
return count(aws_s3_bucket) as value

widgets.title: Unencrypted S3 buckets containing CloudTrail Logs

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find unique aws_s3_bucket with encrypted!=true that (logs|allows) aws_cloudtrail 
return count(aws_s3_bucket) as value

widgets.title: Non-public S3 buckets exposed via public facing EC2 instances

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find Internet 
  that allows aws_security_group 
  that protects aws_instance with active=true 
  that uses aws_iam_role that assigned AccessPolicy 
  that allows (aws_s3|aws_s3_bucket) with classification!='public' 
return tree

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find aws_s3_bucket with bucketSizeBytes != undefined as bucket 
return 
  bucket.name, bucket.tag.AccountName, 
  bucket.numberOfObjects, bucket.bucketSizeBytes, 
  bucket.bucketSizeBytes / 1000000000 * 0.023 as monthlyCost,
  bucket.lifecycleEnabled, bucket.retentionPeriod, bucket.webLink
order by bucket.bucketSizeBytes DESC limit 10

widgets.title: S3 buckets hosting static content for CloudFront distribution (CDN)

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_cloudfront_distribution that connects aws_s3_bucket
return tree

widgets.title: Non-public buckets with Objects that can be public

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_s3_bucket 
  with classification != 'public' and
    ignorePublicAcls != true and 
    restrictPublicBuckets != true
  as bucket
return 
  bucket.displayName, 
  bucket.tag.AccountName, 
  bucket.classification, 
  bucket.webLink

widgets.title: S3 buckets without default encryption enabled

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_s3_bucket with encrypted != true as bucket
return bucket.tag.AccountName as name, count(bucket) as value

widgets.title: Buckets granted access to AWS services without source condition

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_s3_bucket as bucket
that allows Service 
  with name = ('serverlessrepo' or 'cloudtrail' or 'config')
where 
  allows.conditions = undefined or (
  allows.conditions !~= 'aws:SourceAccount' and 
  allows.conditions !~= 'aws:PrincipalOrgId' and
  allows.conditions !~= bucket.accountId
  )
return tree

widgets.title: Public buckets with sensitive data or secrets

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find (Everyone|aws_cloudfront_distribution)
that (allows|connects) aws_s3_bucket 
that has Finding 
  with hasSecrets=true or hasSensitiveData=true
return tree

widgets.title: S3 cross account access via VPC peering

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find (aws_s3|aws_s3_bucket) 
  that allows aws_vpc_endpoint
  that has aws_vpc
  that connects aws_vpc
return TREE

widgets.title: SAML SSO users with access to prod s3 buckets

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find okta_user that assigned AccessRole
  that assigned AccessPolicy
  that allows (aws_s3|aws_s3_bucket|aws_account) with tag.Production=true
  (that has aws_s3)?
  (that has aws_s3_bucket)?
return tree
